text.section: Except as otherwise provided in § 16-506.1 of this subtitle, an applicant who otherwise qualifies for a certificate is entitled to be examined as provided in this section.
The Commission periodically shall give examinations to qualified applicants at the times and places that the Commission determines.
The Commission shall give each qualified applicant notice of the time and place of examination.

To take an examination, an applicant shall pay an examination fee to the Commission or the Commission's designee in an amount not to exceed the cost of the examination as established by the Commission.

section.section: Except as otherwise provided in this subsection, the Commission shall determine the scope and the passing score for examinations given under this subtitle.
The form of an examination shall be written.
